trans-unit.source: normality is open source, licensed under a standard MIT license (included in this repository as LICENSE).
trans-unit.target: normality is open source, licensed under a standard MIT license (included in this repository as LICENSE ).

trans-unit.source: WARNING: This library works much better when used in combination with pyicu, a Python binding for the International Components for Unicode C library. ICU provides much better text transliteration than the default text-unidecode.
trans-unit.target: WARNING: This library works much better when used in combination with pyicu , a Python binding for the International Components for Unicode C library. ICU provides much better text transliteration than the default text-unidecode .
テキスト文字列を正規化するためのマイクロライブラリ

trans-unit.source: Normality is a Python micro-package that contains a small set of text normalization functions for easier re-use. These functions accept a snippet of unicode or utf-8 encoded text and remove various classes of characters, such as diacritics, punctuation etc. This is useful as a preparation to further text analysis.
trans-unit.target: Normality は Python のマイクロパッケージで、再利用を容易にするためのテキスト正規化関数の小さなセットを含んでいます。これらの関数は、unicodeやutf-8でエンコードされたテキストのスニペットを受け入れ、様々なクラスの文字、例えばdiacriticsや句読点などを削除します。これは、さらなるテキスト解析の準備として有用です。
